name: The outer space
description:
The outer space was made for Ludum Dare 50. Link: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/the-outer-space.

You were attacked and damaged the main ship. Don’t let the enemies destroy the main ship and hold out for 10 minutes before evacuating.

Control:

- W/S to move forward/backward - A/D to rotate left/right - E to open shop - Left Mouse Button to shot
